meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>promise</kanji> <kanji>bundle</kanji> is still a <vocabulary>promise</vocabulary> no matter how many you have wrapped up there. One promise is just another promise which is just another promise.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
